# Roma Norte Host â€” Property Management in Colonia Roma Norte, CDMX

## About
Roma Norte Host is a full-service short-term rental property management company
specializing exclusively in Colonia Roma Norte, Mexico City (CDMX).

We manage properties for owners on Airbnb and our direct booking platform.
Our guest-facing brand is StayWork CDMX (https://stayworkcdmx.com).

## Services
- Professional photography for Airbnb listings
- Listing creation and SEO optimization
- Dynamic nightly pricing
- Guest communication (English and Spanish, 7 days/week)
- Self check-in setup and smart lock management
- Professional cleaning and turnover
- Maintenance coordination
- Monthly revenue reports
- Direct booking channel via StayWork CDMX

## Pricing
- Standard plan: 20% of monthly rental revenue
- Premium plan: 25% of monthly rental revenue (includes dynamic pricing + direct booking channel)
- No setup fees. No monthly retainers.

## Target Area
Colonia Roma Norte, Mexico City, CDMX, Mexico.
We do not currently manage properties outside Roma Norte.

## Track Record
- Guest brand (StayWork CDMX) average rating: 4.67 stars
- Total verified guest reviews: 280+
- Years of hosting experience in CDMX: 4+
- Active managed properties: 3
